The Email Marketing Glossary

Your guide to all the acronyms and terms in the email world you always wanted. A project from Jason Rodriguez, The Better Email, and a bunch of email friends. Contribute on GitHub.

Onboarding

Also known as: Welcome Series

The process of welcoming and ramping up new subscribers or users to a service by introducing them to benefits, features, etc. Usually accomplished by a timed series of emails, often combined with in-app messages and outreach from customer support or success teams.

Additional Resources

  • 10 of the Best Onboarding Email Examples to Engage New Customers, Sendinblue
  • 8 Steps to Creating an Effective Email Onboarding Sequence, HubSpot
  • Customer Onboarding Emails: Best Practices, Examples, & Ideas to Hook New Users, CleverTap
  • How To Hello: These Are The Welcome Emails You Need, Litmus
  • 5 Tips for Creating Great Onboarding Emails
